Why use Docquity?

Acquire the necessary knowledge to be successful in today’s ever changing world. Docquity helps you with masterclasses, courses, webinars, publications and an extensive library of content from the region’s best healthcare professionals.

Get started
Discuss Clinical Experiences

You’ll get invaluable support from a network of capable peers who understand the challenges you face and want to see you succeed.You’ll get invaluable support from a network of capable peers who understand the challenges you face and want to see you succeed.

Explore medical Insights

H3 DocTalks

We have curated a list of short videos of top key opinion leaders in Asia to ensure even the busiest doctors can participate and learn.

H3 Certified CME/CPD Credits

Regularly expand and refresh your medical knowledge on variety of industry topics. All that while securing CME and CPD credits from the comfort of your home.

Live & Interactive Webinars

Access industry specific content you won’t find anywhere else.

Discussing variety of specialized medical topics. Interact with the speakers live during the webinars. Recorded version of the webinars let you watch them anytime at your convenience

Everything you need to save human lives, for years to come

Our webinars cover a variety of topics across oncology, cardiology, clinical nutrition, dermatology, neurology and a lot more.

Why Docquity

One app to support your healthcare career

Secure

We are serious about security, all of our chats are 256K SHA encrypted.

Private

Only verified doctors from medical societies and associations are allowed to use the app.

Trusted

We work with the region’s leading hospitals, medical associations and pharmaceutical companies to bring the entire ecosystem together.

Most trusted community for doctors
